name: Foodo World - Official Trailer [iOS/Apple TV]
description:
Foodo World (iPad/iPhone/Apple TV) is a text-free app for toddlers that continues the story of the purple monster from Foodo Kitchen. This time, he embarks on a journey through the forest, the skies and the sea, trying to deliver a cake to a friend, or doing whatever monsters do. 
The app is an open-ended realm of exploration, where the hero encounters random acts of kindness and joy through approximately 100 delightful animations. Rather than a game, we've created a world of play - the kids are free to roam and tell their own story about compassion and laughter. 

My Job: Character animation, video editing 

App made by Tutu Lab! http://www.tutulab.com
Follow us on Twitter: @tutulab

Available on the App Store NOW! https://itunes.apple.com/app/foodo-wo...

Music: "Marty Gots a Plan" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) CC BY-SA 3.0

name: PURENA
description:
Purena is a range of 100% juices, nectars and drinks for the Hotel and Catering Industry. Purena products are offered in a concentrate form, so that you can reconstitute them with water directly at your hotel, restaurant or canteen.

Client: Purena
Creative Direction: Robert Kalfas
Producer: Maja Turek (pink-media.pl)
Design: Małgorzata Sadza
Animation: Robert Kalfas
Music: Audiojungle.com
